name: Speed & Technical SEO
shortDescription: Make your website faster and fix technical issues hurting your rankings.
heroDescription: Slow websites lose visitors and rank lower in search results. We optimize your site's performance, fix technical SEO issues, and improve your Core Web Vitals scores.

deliverables.title: Image Optimization
deliverables.description: Compress and serve images in modern formats

deliverables.title: Code Optimization
deliverables.description: Minify CSS/JS and eliminate render-blocking resources

deliverables.title: Core Web Vitals
deliverables.description: Improve LCP, FID, and CLS scores

deliverables.title: Technical SEO Fixes
deliverables.description: Fix crawl errors, broken links, and indexing issues

whoItsFor: Sites penalized by Google's Core Web Vitals update
E-commerce stores losing sales due to speed

process.title: Audit
process.description: We analyze performance and technical issues

process.title: Prioritize
process.description: We identify quick wins and major fixes

process.title: Verify
process.description: We measure improvements and document changes

seo.title: Speed & Technical SEO Services
seo.description: Make your website faster and fix technical SEO issues. Professional optimization for better Core Web Vitals and search rankings.
